issue.title: [Java] Error comments for Minor Type of TIMESTAMPSEC
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14601](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14601). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For the MinorType of TIMESTAMP SEC, which should be the time in the second from the 

`

the Unix epoch, 00:00:00  on 1 jan 1970 UTC

`

But the comment is 
```

00:00:00.000000

``` and is present the type TIMESTAMPMICRO

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14601?focusedCommentId=17439060) by Kun Liu (liukun):*
fixed in the Pull Request: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11618

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14601?focusedCommentId=17439573) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11618
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/11618>
